DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates treatment with combination versus monotherapy for patients with metastatic ocular melanoma.
DOC.detailed_description: Treatment of patients with metastatic ocular melanoma with combination chemotherapy Gemcitabine and Treosulfan versus monotherapy with Treosulfan as first-line chemotherapy.
DOC.criteria: Metastatic ocular melanoma Prior treatment with chemotherapy Active 2nd malignancy Cerebral metastasis
